title: Multiple political parties in China and Mexico

content.prompt: Which of the following is true of political participation and parties in China and Mexico?

choices.label: In both China and Mexico, citizens associated with foreign, nongovernmental organizations cannot form political parties or vote in national elections.
Opposition parties supported the protests in China in 2013, but no opposition party supported protests in Mexico in the 1990s.
